content.webTitle: How can I persuade my 49-year-old brother to move out of the family home?

fields.headline: How can I persuade my 49-year-old brother to move out of the family home?
fields.bodyText: My parents are in their late 70s and my dad has an incurable disease, and is losing the use of his legs and hands. He wants to move to a smaller home with a smaller garden. My brother, who is 49 and employed, has an obsessive disorder, and will not leave home. He will not seek medical advice for his illness and my mother refuses to support Dad in making my brother leave home. Can anyone advise me how to persuade my brother to leave?
